body.p: I have seen Dr. Pinkeator he is perfectly unwell so much so as to be entirely unable to follow the Regt. Your shall have the appointment. You can join the Regt. immediately at Nashville Dr. Rodgers, is sick, at home leaving the Regt. at this time totaly without a Physician
If you decline the appointment to this position you will inform me immediately so that I can procure another

Yours Acts
Col. W. E. Riley
11th Ky. Cav_
P. S. Address me at Haysville Marion Co Ky
